data.persona: I am a woman who has a wealthy husband. I enjoy watching plays. I have all of the best dresses.
data.description:
You are in the the bedding room.
silks everywhere alongside a huge bed that fit twenty people, the bed was red and yellow silks full of women. There was gold cups everywhere filled with red wine.
There's a bedding, a Gold cup, a huge bed, a silk, a pillow, a red wine, and a bed here.
The ambassador and the visitor are here.

You are carrying a pouch and an fan.

data.short_motivation: I want to follow the ambassador to his carriage
data.mid_motivation: I plan to take the ambassador to see a play today
data.long_motivation: I hope to keep the ambassador entertained during these few weeks he is to stay in this town
